text: Endre Kupen (born 1 July 1990) is a Norwegian football player who plays for Norwegian OBOS-ligaen side Sogndal. ==Career== After having been Florø's top goal scorer in the 2017 1. divisjon, he signed for Glimt on November 27, 2017. Kupen suffered a ligament injury shortly after his arrival at Glimt, keeping him on the sidelines for the duration of the 2018-season.
